Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI goes into feedback where you need it for things that are too mundane or time-consuming to go back and forth with a teacher on. My teachers can give me reliable and more robust feedback that can at the very least, point me in the right direction

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I feel comfortable asking GenAI “dumb” questions to check my own understanding on a topic

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: My teachers’ feedback is tailored to the course content while GenAI is more general
